data.short_description: The Full Official Soundtrack to the indie game Domina

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.2Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3, 3D accelerated card
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 3.0Ghz +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4, 3D accelerated card
  • Sound Card: Yes
